choices: White unicon eating your blue roses.
1.content:
You are the Isabella, princess of the blue roses.you are sitting on the river bank in the night ,and start to playing your harp and you start to sing slowly..suddenly you here something and you start listening where it come from..you hidden your self in the rose bushes,and you start to look through the rose leaves.. you try to hold your breath..whole surrounding is calm and quiet..only you can here your heart beat and sighs..

then you saw...
1.title: Begining of the story..

choices: There is a prince riding this way!
11.content:
You watch as a magnificent swan swims up to the river side. She begins to call out,
         "Isabella! Isabella! Where are you?" you creep out from the roses in which you were hiding,
         "I am here Sobi, what did you want?" you ask your old friend. She responds...
11.title: News

info.brief_description: You have to find away to cure the frozen heart...
info.description:
This story is about sky kingdom and the Green land.It is a busy day to sky kingdom and the Divon don't know what is going on.He is confusing and he feel to ride his unicorn and feel to leave the kingdom for a moment.
Divon is the most handsome guy in the sky kingdom and the cleverest knight.But he couldn't feel anything because of his uncle's cruel power.His warm heart changed to the frozen heart.So he don't feel anything about love,kindness,etc.He don't care about anything.He is the real king of the kingdom,but because of his uncle he couldn't become the king.
you have to break that cruel power and have to change the Divon's frozen heart too.From a true love from a special lady who lives in the green land can change the Divon's frozen heart.After that Divon and you have to find a priest to break the power of Divon's uncle. But this priest is a prisoner of the queen of green land.

1)You must be a special lady live in the green land and lady who change the Divon's frozen heart.
2)Be creative
3)you can add romance and love parts,but more sexual parts are prohibit.
4)Have a fun..
